Name: Turnament
About the game: Take control of your seeker and become the space miner you always wanted to be. Turn grid squares to destroy enemy drones before they destroy you. Space-themed puzzles with real-time-strategy elements 2-hour-long single-player campaign Endless Mode: Play generated levels with seed numbers and unlockables Challenge Mode: Try to beat remixed campaign levels Level Editor: Create and upload your own levels from within the game Player Levels: Download and play levels created by other players Chill soundtrack by Muddasheep featuring KAON and Veven Character art by Elhyana Guillaume (Uploading and downloading player levels requires an internet connection.)
Meta Title: Turnament: Feb 17, 2023, Philipp Lehner and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Turnament? Check out the release date (Feb 17, 2023), developer insights from Philipp Lehner, and a complete game summary.
